title: UAE 2026 investment guide: Step-by-step tips to buy an off-plan property in Dubai, with costs and risks
summary_full: Buying off-plan property in Dubai offers strategic entry into the market with flexible payment plans and potential price appreciation. Read on as we outline the process, from developer research and DLD/RERA registration to understanding costs, signing SPAs and navigating handover. While offering benefits like lower entry prices and customisation, buyers must be aware of risks such as construction delays and market fluctuations.
